summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 31339, entitled, "An Ordinance providing for the laying off, extending and established of West Fifty-ninth Street, from Fist Avenue Northwest to Third Avenue Northwest; of Second Avenue Northwest, from West Fifty-ninth Street, as extended herein, to the south line of Tract Thirty-two (32), Ballard Acre Tracts, all in the City of Seattle; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary, and providing that the entire cost of said improvement shall be paid by special assessment upon the property specially benefited in the manner provided by law;" approved May 20, 1913, and published May 27, 1913.
